post.body: Thanks man! I'll check it out! :)
Aw. Well, that's cool. Hey, would you also know of a decent Word Processor. At least one better than Notes?
@louistag Thanks guys! Still no way to highlight, or take notes within the app?
YES!
iSleep. Short shift tomorrow, then hangout time with awesome friends. G'night.
Hm. Seems to be some issues with the WordPress iPhone app.
Done! Nice and simple.
Attempting to update my blog so I can post directly from my iPod. Should work. Wish me luck.
Nap time.
That's not set in stone. Still working on it. My brother Craig's gonna help me with it.
Slow day at work. Hey. Name for my Podcast: Captain Awesome and the wiggity, wiggity, WHATs?
iSleep.
Trying to find a good Bible App for the Touch. Any suggestions?
Totally got my iPod Touch to finally recognize the wifi at Starbucks. Yeah! Woo!
iPod Touching it up.
www.explosivelimes.com updated! Check it out. Then commission me for a project. Yeah! Woo! Gotta get a new Mac. Ugh. All my Mac software. :(
Crud. My PowerBook's finally given up the ghost. Won't power up. :( Yikes. I need some kind of fund raiser to get a new Mac. Taking orders.
My iPod Touch was in Memphis TN at 5am. Just a couple hours away. Things are looking bright for the Boy Wonder. Ima take a shower now.
It is the future. It is the future. - It is the distant future. The year Two Thousand. And nine. Yes. Affirmative.
I have too many red hots in my mouth right now.
